price: Or [do they ascribe to Allah] one who is brought up in adornments and is not able to present a clear argument in disputation?
arabic: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّؤُاْ فِي ٱلۡحِلۡيَةِ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡخِصَامِ غَيۡرُ مُبِينٖ
